projects.title: LinkedIn Profile Data Extraction
projects.description: Categorize and save LinkedIn profiles to your sheet using a browser extension and n8n.
projects.overview: This workflow scrapes a LinkedIn profile (via your extension capture), classifies it with AI and stores the data in Google Sheets with proper schema.

projects.title: Personalized Outbound
projects.description: Generate personalized messages after analyzing a LinkedIn profile.
projects.overview: Given a profile URL or record, the workflow crafts a context-aware email using your tone and templates, and logs the outreach.

projects.title: Gmail → Google Sheets Logger
projects.description: On new Gmail email, extract subject, sender, timestamp and append a row to Google Sheets.

projects.title: Gmail → Google Drive Backup
projects.description: Save Gmail attachments to Google Drive and index file links in Google Sheets.

projects.title: Outlook → Slack Notifications
projects.description: Notify Slack #alerts for Outlook emails with 'urgent' in the subject.

projects.title: Google Calendar Daily Digest
projects.description: Send a morning Slack summary of today's Google Calendar events.

projects.title: YouTube → Sheets Analytics
projects.description: Daily fetch of channel metrics (views, likes, comments) appended to Google Sheets.

projects.title: Slack Keyword Alerts
projects.description: Watch Slack #general and email when messages contain tracked keywords.

projects.title: Reddit Post Saver
projects.description: Save new subreddit posts (title, URL, author) into Google Docs.

projects.title: Chat → Gmail Forwarder
projects.description: Forward incoming Chat messages to Gmail with sender and text.

projects.title: LinkedIn Connection Logger
projects.description: On new LinkedIn connection, append name, title, profile link to Google Sheets.

projects.title: Slack → Google Drive Sync
projects.description: Backup Slack channel uploads to Google Drive and track links in Sheets.

projects.title: Google Calendar → Sheets
projects.description: Log new Google Calendar events (name, date, attendees) in Google Sheets.

projects.title: Simple Registration Form → Sheets
projects.description: Append form submissions into Google Sheets.

projects.title: Docs → Gmail Share
projects.description: Email yourself when a new Google Doc is created, including the link.

projects.title: Sheets → Slack Update
projects.description: Send a Slack message summarizing each newly added Google Sheets row.

projects.title: File Upload → Drive
projects.description: When a new local file appears, upload it to Google Drive and log to Sheets.

projects.title: LinkedIn Profile Scraper
projects.description: Scrape LinkedIn profile details with Apify and append to Google Sheets.

projects.title: Form → Tavily Email Validator
projects.description: Validate submitted emails with Tavily and write validated entries to Sheets.

projects.title: Reddit → YouTube Ideas
projects.description: Summarize Reddit posts with ChatGPT into 3 YouTube content ideas and store in Sheets.

projects.title: Slack → AI Summarizer
projects.description: Summarize last 24h Slack messages with ChatGPT and save a report in Google Docs.

projects.title: Google Drive → Firecrawl Indexing
projects.description: Index new Google Drive files with Firecrawl and write the searchable link to Sheets.

projects.title: AI-Powered Lead Enrichment
projects.description: Scrape LinkedIn/companies (Apify) + crawl (Firecrawl) + enrich with ChatGPT/Gemini → Google Doc report.

projects.title: Multi-Agent Research Assistant
projects.description: Tavily sources; Gemini + ChatGPT + Claude summarize and cross-check; outputs report to Docs + Sheets.
